mapper.select: SELECT distinct c.mno, c.product_Count, p.PRODUCT_BNO, p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.PRODUCT_PRICE FROM cart_tbl c JOIN member_tbl m ON c.mno = m.mno JOIN product_tbl p ON c.product_bno = p.PRODUCT_BNO where c.mno=#{mno}
select CAST(sum(product_count) AS NUMBER) as product_count from cart_tbl where mno=#{mno} and product_Bno=#{product_Bno}
select count(*) from cart_tbl where mno=#{mno} and product_Bno=#{product_Bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart_tbl(cartNum, mno, product_Bno, product_Count) VALUES (cartNum_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{mno}, #{product_Bno},#{product_Count})
